text: Hazezon Tamar was the governor of Bryce on Dominaria , during the time the city-state experienced a conflict with Tirras orchestrated by Johan . Hazezon rallied his ex-wife Adira Strongheart and her Robaran Mercenaries with the aid of Jaeger Ojanen , a strange tiger man of the forest of Efrava . After Jaeger's death, Hazezon allied with Jaeger's son, Jedit Ojanen , eventually putting a stop to Johan's rule once and for all.
